query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Development of adaptation measures and verification of effectiveness using Acclimate model
result.description: Adaptation measures to reduce vulnerability and increase resilience are developed: Adaptation measures that reduce the economic impact of remote weather extremes have been developed and tested in Acclimate (task 6.4). The effectiveness of the measure was demonstrated and verified within the numerical model Acclimate.

result.title: Assessment of the value of storylines for stakeholders
result.description: Assessment of the value of the developed storylines in enhancing stakeholders’ understanding about climate change impacts and informing their decision-making through stakeholder interviews. Linked to task 2.4.

result.title: Assessment of correlated aspects of hotspot responses to climate change
result.description: Drawing on the assessments of the effect of climate change on the storylines for each sector performed within the sectoral WPs, ensure physical consistency between those assessments and identify any correlated (including potentially anti-correlated) risks. The latter will be done by identifying common physical drivers of the different circulation regimes.

result.title: Cost-Benefit Analysis: Case Studies
result.description: This deliverable deals with the economic evaluations from the community point of view. The CBA will apply the economic model at the case study level via UBOC’s own assumptions on unit costs that are not disclosed, and investigate the public convenience of the project, including effects which are normally not priced in the market (such as safety and environmental sustainability) by means of techniques complying with the EC Guidelines; and producing aggregate indicators such as the project’s Net Present Value, Internal Rate of Return and Benefit/Cost Ratio.

result.title: Initial Hexa-X vision, use cases and KVIs
result.description: This report will describe the vision to guide the future research towards B5G6G Use cases and key value indicators will be identified providing highlevel requirements and definitions of the deployment scenarios An initial set of sustainability targets and spectrum requirements will also be included as well as security guidelines
